item.title: Marvel Rivals Season 4 Trailer Confirms PS4 Release
item.content:encoded:
The official trailer for Marvel Rivals Season 4 has been revealed, confirming the PS4 release plans.

Just a day ago, a report emerged stating that Marvel Rivals would be coming to a past-gen platform (PS4) in an upcoming update, and now that report has been officially confirmed by the developers. More details about the new season have been confirmed, including the new heroes, theme, and more.

Marvel Rivals is Offically Coming to the PS4

Marvel Rivals has just received the official trailer for Season 4, “The Heart of the Dragon”, which features the likes of Angela and Daredevil battling it out. Towards the end of the trailer, it was confirmed that Marvel Rivals is coming to PS4, as it was listed alongside the other existing platforms: PS5, Xbox Series X/S, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store. The release date for the platform has not been revealed, but the new season is scheduled to arrive on September 12.

The new season trailer has also semi-confirmed a set of leaks for Marvel Rivals season 4. The trailer has confirmed that Angela and Daredevil will be the new stars of the season. Also, the part where Daredevil opposes Angela, “embodying the Dragon and the Tiger”, in The Heart of the Dragon was confirmed too. All that is left to be revealed is the new game mode, team-ups, and skins for the upcoming season.

In other news, Deadpool is expected to arrive in the near future. Additionally, Marvel Rivals players have explained the matchmaking system in response to player criticism. What are your thoughts on Marvel Rivals releasing for PS4? Let us know through the official Insider Gaming forums discussion.
